about.title: More about Music Online Courses
content: Music online courses offer learners a variety of lessons and detailed training on playing musical instruments, sheet music, melody, harmony and music memory, as well as discovering music composers and technology. Study world music online. Discover the aesthetics and history of music. Get a broad overview of the rhythm and develop your listening skills through the study of music.

By addressing the essentials of music education, composing and production, our music online courses will help you discover the magical world of music creation — whether you are planning to use it as a hobby or for professional purposes.
